aggregationType.description: This is the shipment Notification Aggregation Type.

emailNotificationRecipients.description: These are email notification recipient details.

name.description:
Specify the recipient name.
Example: Joe Smith

emailNotificationRecipientType.description: Specify the recipient type for email notification.

emailAddress.description:
Specify the recipient email address.
Example: xyz@aol.com

notificationFormatType.description:
This is the format for the email notification. Either HTML or plain text can be provided.
Example: TEXT

notificationType.description:
Indicate the type of notification that will be sent as an email
Example: EMAIL

locale.description:
These are the locale details for email.
Example: en_US, fr_CA, es_MX,.etc.
click here to see Locales
Note: If the locale is left blank or an invalid locale is entered, an error message is returned in response.

notificationEventType.description:
These are to specify the notification event types.
Example: [ON_PICKUP_DRIVER_ARRIVED, ON_SHIPMENT]

items.description: These are recipient details for receiving email notification.

personalMessage.description:
This is your personal message for the email.
Note: The maximum personal message character limit depends on the element notificationFormatType values:
  • If notificationFormatType is TEXT, then only 120 characters printed on the email
  • If notificationFormatType is HTML, then 500 characters printed on the email

Example: This is concerning the order 123456 of 26 July 2021 - art no 34324-23 Teddy Bear, brown

description: This is used to provide eMail notification information..
